column2: ENGLISH
A Loving Marriage ends with my death.
I keep thinking about [From.GetTitledFirstName]. She was the best of wives, and without her, I do so struggle to be a [Root.GetTitle]. Oh, how I miss her....
Who will my father trust in now?
The rest of my sons are nowhere near the abilities of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. He knew how to handle a sword, and would have been a great [Root.GetTitle] after my death.
My wife is pregnant, but she better give birth to a decent son this time. Else she may 'accidentally' fall down from a tower.
I hope the circumstances of my untimely death makes someone suspicious. I did NOT die a natural death...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] did not die a natural death, of that I am certain! I suspect one of the courtiers to be behind [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s unfortunate demise.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is certain someone murdered one of [From.GetHerHis] dear friends, and wants me to imprison the courtier who [From.GetSheHe] thinks is the murderer.
I died while I was serving [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], now I hope [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] will honor my last wish and bury me properly...
For you, everything!
Wenching might make me forget her!
I'm dead
Maybe my wife can give me another son?
I know it was nothing wrong with ME
Someone suspects I did not die naturally!
I will keep my grudge
[From.GetTitledFirstName] must be delusional!
Keep your promise or I will haunt you, forever!
I will never forget [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
I have other sons, maybe one of them can be worthy
There's no doubt in my mind, the murderer will be imprisoned!
[From.GetTitledFirstName], your friend's murderer will be imprisoned!
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] must listen to reason!
He will mourn us
[Root.Father.GetTitledFirstName] will have to deal with it.
Visit [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] in her bedchamber.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] reacts to the strange circumstances of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s death
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is told about [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s suspicions

[From.GetTitledFirstName] had made me promise I would bury [From.GetHerHim] properly and I keep my promises. I walked beside [From.GetHerHis] coffin to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s last rest and the wailing of the mourners was almost more than I could bear. [From.GetSheHeCap] died too young!
Requiescat in pace
One less mouth to feed
I should help [From.GetHerHis] widow
Inna Lillahi wa inna ilaihi raji'un
You will not be forgotten
[This.GetTitledFirstName] keeps [This.GetHerHis] promise to [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
